en: White Flower
A white flower I found on the grass. It appears to be a lily... I think.
zh_TW: 我在草地上發現的白花。看起來是百合…吧。

en: Wet White Flower
A white flower I took from a vase. It's probably a Lily.
zh_TW: 我從花瓶中拿出的白花。大概是百合。

en: Ritual Notes
I put everything I need to remember here.
zh_TW: 我把需要記住的東西都記在這裡。

en: Ritual Notes (Drawing)
This is how it looks in my head.
zh_TW: 在我腦中看來是這樣子。

en: Candles
A bunch of candles. I need these for the ritual.
zh_TW: 一綑蠟燭。儀式要用到這些。

en: Chalk
A piece of chalk. I can draw various things with it.
zh_TW: 一截粉筆。我可以用它在各種東西上畫畫。

en: Curtains
Red blackout curtains used to block as much light as possible.
zh_TW: 用來儘量遮擋光線的紅黑色窗簾

en: Lighter
My personal lighter. I don't smoke, but I enjoy watching things burn.
zh_TW: 我自己的打火機。我不抽菸，可是我喜歡看東西燃燒。

en: Old Lighter
An old lighter I had lost a long time ago. It doesn't seem to work anymore.
zh_TW: 我遺失已久的舊打火機。看起來已經沒用了。

en: Scissors
A regular pair of scissors. Not pointy enough to stab people with.
zh_TW: 普通的剪刀。沒有尖到可以用來刺人。

en: Girl's Hair
A tuft of hair I cut from the girl with brown hair.
zh_TW: 一束我從有著棕髮的女孩剪下的頭髮

en: Girl's Hair
A tuft of hair I cut from the girl with black hair.
zh_TW: 一束我從有著黑髮的女孩剪下的頭髮

en: Girl's Hair
A tuft of hair I cut from the girl with dark brown hair.
zh_TW: 一束我從有著暗棕髮的女孩剪下的頭髮

en: My Hair
A bit of hair I cut from myself. Looking at it makes me sad.
zh_TW: 一些我自己剪下的頭髮。看著它讓我難過。

en: Protective Rune
A rune with some ancient symbol engraved.
Protective Rune
A rune with some ancient symbol engraved.
Protective Rune
A rune with some ancient symbol engraved.
Student's Notebook
A red notebook, probably forgotten by a student. The color and design are not my style.
zh_TW: 一本紅色筆記本，大概是學生忘記的。顏色和設計不是我的風格。

en: Theater Club Key
The key to open the theater club room.
zh_TW: 用來打開話劇社辦的鑰匙

en: Dusty Hairpin
My trusty hairpin! I have a feeling this could come in handy.
zh_TW: 我可靠的髮夾！感覺會用到它。

en: Fairly Normal-Looking Key
A key I found on a long hallway.
zh_TW: 我在長廊上發現的鑰匙

en: Lettuce
You're not supposed to have this in your inventory.
zh_TW: 妳的物品庫不應該有這個。

en: Small Key
A small key, probably for a locker.
zh_TW: 小鑰匙，大概是儲物櫃的。

en: Strange Blueprints
Blueprints for an unknown device. You can't make heads or tails out of it.
zh_TW: 未知裝置的藍圖。妳看不出這到底是什麼。
